entities.name: dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is a symbol of the Death Eaters' allegiance to Voldemort. It is mentioned that it has been growing stronger for months.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are followers of Voldemort. They know that Harry Potter must be about to return.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a person who escaped like the narrator wants to do.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person that the Dark Lord thought was the narrator's man.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the Dark Lord who has been displeased with the narrator's lateness.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a person who sneers at the narrator and asks for useful information.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who conveys information directly to Voldemort.

relationships.description: Snape conveys information directly to Voldemort.
Bellatrix is considered loyal to Voldemort by him.
Voldemort thought Dumbledore was the narrator's man.
